current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to protect
		  employees in the building and construction industry who are participants in
		  multiemployer plans, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the
			 following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
Vested Employee Pension Benefit
			 Protection Act

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

header.#text:
Minimum age for
			 distributions during working retirement

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended to read as follows:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Paragraph (36) of section 401(a) of the Internal Revenue
			 Code of 1986

text.#text:
A trust forming part of a pension plan shall not be
				treated as failing to constitute a qualified trust under this section solely
				because the plan provides that a distribution may be made from such trust to an
				employee who has attained age 62 and who is not separated from employment at
				the time of such distribution.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
applies was in existence before January 1, 1970,
				and

applies constituted a qualified trust under this
				section.

text.#text:
before December
				31, 2011, at a time when the plan provided that distributions may be made to an
				employee who has attained age 55 and who is not separated from employment at
				the time of such distribution, the plan received at least 1 written
				determination from the

header.#text:
Certain
				employees in the building and construction industry

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, with
				respect to individuals who were participants in such plan on or before April
				30, 2013, if—
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section
				4203(b)(1)(B)(i) of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974/s:4203/ss:b/p:1/sp:B/cl:i

quote.#tail: in the case of a multiemployer plan described in

text.#text:
The amendment made by this section shall apply to
			 distributions made before, on, or after the date of the enactment of this
			 Act.
